title: +-Fear - Conquer your fear of public speaking
blurb: Mixed reality application that allows someone to practice speaking in public to hologram "audiences"
content_html:
Inspiration

Team leader has a fear of speaking in public

What it does

Display holographic images of audiences where the player can practice speaking to audiences of different sizes

How I built it

Microsoft HoloLens

Challenges I ran into

No team member had Unity or HoloLens experience

Accomplishments that I'm proud of

Diving in and learning new technologies

What I learned

Intro to Unity and HoloLens

What's next for +-Fear - Conquer your fear of public speaking

undecided

Team Leader Shailee Rindani 404-271-5393
